summary: 2002 CHRYSLER CONCORDE.  DRIVER'S SEAT BACK SUDDENLY RECLINED.  THE SEAT BACK WILL NOT STAY UP.  CHRYSLER RECALL C04 (NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER 03V035000 HAD ALLEGEDLY BEEN PERFORMED ON THIS VEHICLE BY THE SELLING DEALER, LAFLAM CHRYLER IN RUNNEMEDE, NJ,  ON FEB 20, 2007.
